feature.label: Orc Eclipse plug-in
feature.provider-name: The University of Texas at Austin
feature.description: The Orc programming language plug-in for the Eclipse IDE (Integrated Development Environment). Provides editing, parsing, building, and execution services for the Orc programming language in Eclipse. Orc is a structured concurrent programming language.
